00010 #include "log4cpp/Priority.hh"
00011 
00012 namespace log4cpp {
00013 
00014     const std::string& Priority::getPriorityName(int priority) {
00015         static std::string names[9] = {"PANIC", "ALERT", "ERROR", "WARN", "NOTICE",
00016                                   "INFO", "DEBUG", "NOTSET", "UNKOWN" };
00017         
00018         priority++;
00019         priority /= 100;
00020         return ((priority < 1) || (priority > 8)) ?
00021             names[8] :
00022             names[priority - 1];
00023     }
00024 }
